description.zh-cn: 清末民国时期上海大颜料商、实业家，邵逸夫之父。他是北宋邵康节的第三十二世嫡孙，曾秘密交往光复会、同盟会，并出资支持辛亥革命。
description.en: A major pigment merchant and industrialist in Shanghai during the late Qing Dynasty and the Republic of China, and the father of Run Run Shaw. He was the 32nd-generation direct descendant of Shao Kangjie of the Northern Song Dynasty. He secretly associated with the Guangfuhui and Tongmenghui and financially supported the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲影视大亨，功夫片鼻祖，邵玉轩的第六子。
description.en: An Asian film and television tycoon, progenitor of kung fu films, and the sixth son of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 上海电影实业家，邵玉轩的长子。
description.en: A Shanghai film industrialist and the eldest son of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩的二子。
description.en: The second son of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡企业家，邵玉轩的三子。
description.en: A Singaporean entrepreneur and the third son of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 由邵玉轩于1901年在上海创立的颜料商号。
description.en: A pigment company founded by Shao Yuxuan in Shanghai in 1901.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初上海颜料业商人，与邵玉轩齐名。
description.en: A merchant in the pigment industry in Shanghai during the late Qing and early Republican era, as famous as Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 上海知名商人，邵玉轩的至交。
description.en: A well-known Shanghai merchant and a close friend of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 上海知名商人，邵玉轩的至交。
description.en: A well-known Shanghai merchant and a close friend of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 上海知名商人，邵玉轩的至交。
description.en: A well-known Shanghai merchant and a close friend of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，其反清运动曾获邵玉轩支持。
description.en: A Chinese modern democratic revolutionary whose anti-Qing movement was supported by Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家，其反清运动曾获邵玉轩支持。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary whose anti-Qing movement was supported by Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 清末革命团体，邵玉轩曾与其秘密交往。
description.en: A revolutionary group in the late Qing Dynasty with which Shao Yuxuan had secret dealings.

description.zh-cn: 清末革命团体，邵玉轩是其会员。
description.en: A revolutionary group in the late Qing Dynasty of which Shao Yuxuan was a member.

description.zh-cn: 推翻清朝的中国革命，邵玉轩曾斥巨资资助。
description.en: The Chinese revolution that overthrew the Qing Dynasty, which was heavily funded by Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命期间上海的起义事件，邵玉轩曾斥巨资资助。
description.en: The uprising in Shanghai during the Xinhai Revolution, which was heavily funded by Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 位于浙江省宁波府的历史行政区，是邵玉轩的出生地。
description.en: A historical administrative division in Ningbo Prefecture, Zhejiang Province, and the birthplace of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 邵逸夫是邵玉轩的第六子。
description.en: Run Run Shaw is the sixth son of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 邵醉翁是邵玉轩的长子。
description.en: Runje Shaw is the eldest son of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 邵邨人是邵玉轩的二子。
description.en: Runde Shaw is the second son of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 邵山客是邵玉轩的三子。
description.en: Runme Shaw is the third son of Shao Yuxuan.

description.zh-cn: 1901年，邵玉轩在上海创设“锦泰昌”颜料号。
description.en: In 1901, Shao Yuxuan founded the 'Jintaichang' pigment company in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩与虞洽卿是至交。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan and Yu Qiaqing were close friends.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩与朱葆三是至交。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan and Zhu Baosan were close friends.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩与严信厚是至交。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan and Yan Xinhou were close friends.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩支持孙中山的反清运动。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan supported Sun Yat-sen's anti-Qing movement.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩支持陈其美的反清运动。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan supported Chen Qimei's anti-Qing movement.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩与同盟会秘密交往，并且是其会员。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan had secret dealings with the Tongmenghui and was a member.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩与光复会秘密交往。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan had secret dealings with the Guangfuhui.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩曾斥巨资资助辛亥革命。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan heavily funded the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩曾斥巨资资助上海光复。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan heavily funded the Shanghai Restoration.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩出生于浙江省宁波府镇海县。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan was born in Zhenhai County, Ningbo Prefecture, Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 邵玉轩与周宗良是上海颜料业的同行，二人齐名。
description.en: Shao Yuxuan and Zhou Zongliang were contemporaries in the Shanghai pigment industry and were equally famous.

description.zh-cn: 康有为在1920年邵玉轩逝世后为其赠挽致哀。
description.en: Kang Youwei sent condolences upon Shao Yuxuan's death in 1920.

description.zh-cn: 卢永祥在1920年邵玉轩逝世后为其赠挽致哀。
description.en: Lu Yongxiang sent condolences upon Shao Yuxuan's death in 1920.

description.zh-cn: 1910年，与宋炜臣一道出资修建家乡道路。
description.en: In 1910, he co-funded the construction of roads in his hometown with Song Weichen.

description.zh-cn: 1910年，与阮雯衷一道出资修建家乡道路。
description.en: In 1910, he co-funded the construction of roads in his hometown with Ruan Wenzhong.
